messages.content: ComfyUI-Whisper is a project that allows users to transcribe audio and add subtitles to videos using Whisper in ComfyUI.
Under what license is ComfyUI-Whisper distributed?
ComfyUI-Whisper is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license.
ComfyUI-Whisper can be installed via ComfyUI Manager.
How can users start using ComfyUI-Whisper after installation?
After installation, users need to load the provided workflow into ComfyUI and install any missing custom nodes.
What does the 'Apply Whisper' node do in ComfyUI-Whisper?
The 'Apply Whisper' node transcribes audio and gets timestamps for each segment and word.
What customization options are available when adding subtitles to video frames in ComfyUI-Whisper?
When adding subtitles to video frames using ComfyUI-Whisper, users can specify the font family, font color, and x/y positions.
What is the 'Add Subtitles To Background' feature in ComfyUI-Whisper?
The 'Add Subtitles To Background' feature in ComfyUI-Whisper allows users to add subtitles like a wordcloud on blank frames. This feature is currently experimental.
